description: With practice, you've mastered your rage to allow yourself more versatility.

sections.text: Choose one Charisma-, Dexterity-, or Intelligence-based skill. While you are raging, you can use this skill.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, it applies to a different skill.
sections.name: Special

name: Skilled Rager
